tool_description: Generate number of keywords from given input text.
name: Keyword Generation
title: Keyword Generation

api_list.name: Get Keywords From Input
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://keyword-generation.p.rapidapi.com/get_keywords"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "keyword-generation.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://keyword-generation.p.rapidapi.com/get_keywords"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "keyword-generation.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
